topics.body:
Hello once again, audience. Spent all morning cleaning the back yard and the garage that is too over-sized. My family is going to the mall later and I'm staying at home. Probably invite her over later.

But before any of that I must take a bath now because I smell a dog.
topics.author: 52f0834d63687261cba90300

topics.body: Just getting around to today's JoJo now

topics.body: My cheapness is gettin' pretty annoying.

topics.body:
Wait a second
So Dio is posing at the top of the stairs, he stops time, picks up Polnareff and moves him down the stairs, then runs back up, back into his pose, and starts time, over and over

Dio, you are a child

topics.body:
Just saw Kung fury

It was awesome.

-molly

Okay, so I have to
Is Dio going to get arrogant with his ability to stop time, and is that going to be his downfall

Or will the solution not actually be a cliche, and they have to find a clever way to stop him, like JoJo usually does
